schema.name: Healthyfied Cucumber Strawberry Yogurt Shake

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cucumber and strawberries under cold water.
Slice the cucumber into smaller pieces.
Add the sliced cucumber, soy milk, Stevia In the Raw, strawberries, and Greek yogurt into a blender.
Blend on high speed for about 2 minutes or until smooth.
Pour the shake into glasses and enjoy immediately.

schema.description: Discover a refreshing and low-carb delight with our Healthyfied Cucumber Strawberry Yogurt Shake. Tailored to suit health-conscious individuals, this low-sodium recipe is a perfect blend of wholesome ingredients designed to refresh and rejuvenate. Dive into a world of tasty, healthified recipes with this easy-to-make shake that promises flavor without compromise.
